item.title: 进程创建
item.description: fork linux创建线程的函数 fork –> do_fork do_fork的执行线路 do_fork函数原型 1 2 3 4 5 6 long _do_fork(unsigned long clone_flags, unsigned long stack_start, unsigned long stack_size, int __user *parent_tidptr, int __user *child_tidptr, unsigned long tls); clone_flags stack_start stack_size parent_tidptr child_tidptr tls
